name: Doominator HD
description:
*** Doesn't matter whether it's a thousand – or just one. You doominate! ***

Meet the Doominator - an enthralling arcade multiplayer shooter combining the best traditions of classic desktop titles!

Up to 12 players in exciting online deathmatches is not a joke! To survive in such difficult conditions you will be provided with a powerful set of weapons from a pistol to Big Freaking Gun. Furthermore, in the course of the game you will be able to use samples of the dark matter for improvement and modernization of your armor and inventory!

Grenades, energetic shields, powerful artefacts, various items and even implants.. True deadly toys.

Come on warriors, you wanna live forever?!
